1.20.1.1.20.1-0.3.0: Transferred slot/widget/utils code from DimBag, added array support to newtork messages, added item color registry access, added manual registry access.
1.20.1.1.20.1-0.2.0: Port to NeoForge, fixed many bugs, changed version convention.
1.20.1.1.20.1-B1.3: Port to 1.20.1, new creative tab system (see item registration), some commands arg are lost (need to redo), and most gui has to be rebuild (will do later)

1.19.2.1.19.2-B1.1: New widgets and message to sync data from client menu to server menu (useful if data is not sensitive and generated by a screen client side)
1.19.2.1.19.2-B1.0: Moved to beta for visibility issues with CurseForge, added render utils to create block overlays, improved teleport precision, added scroll feature on NBT tooltip
1.19.2.1.19.2-A1.3.0: Fixed configs and data sync between client and server
